resources.string: This app uses the Open Images Dataset (Version 6) to get image download URLs, bounding boxes to crop the pictures to, and classifications of the bounding boxes.

A random image from the dataset will be chosen and cropped to a bounding box that has a classification. You must guess the correct classification out of four options. Sometimes, there can be multiple answers (for example, a typical human face can be classified as "Face" or "Human Hair") and the quiz will only accept one classification as the true answer. This is a design flaw, so sometimes the player may be unfairly considered wrong.
The annotations from the Open Images Dataset (Version 6) are licensed under the CC BY 4.0 License while the images linked in the dataset are listed to be licensed under the CC BY 2.0 license.
